name: Anurag Choudhary
about: Dynamic Java backend developer adept in Java, Spring, and Hibernate to craft top-tier server-side applications. Demonstrates exceptional problem-solving and teamwork skills. Proficient in leveraging emerging technologies, harnessing Generative AI, and swiftly adapting to new tech stacks to enhance software solutions.

projects.name: Covisafe+ : Your Trusted COVID Vaccine Companion
projects.desc: Covisafe+ offers real-time information, risk assessment, vaccination booking, and community support to combat the pandemic effectively.

projects.name: CodePulse : Amplifying Your Coding Potential
projects.desc: An AI interview platform to practice with AI-driven simulations tailored to your skills and industry. Get instant feedback and performance insights to refine your approach.

projects.name: Lenskart clone
projects.desc: Lenskart is the leading e-commerce portal for eyewear in India.

projects.name: Amazon clone
projects.desc: Amazon is the world's leading e-commerce platform for convenient and affordable shopping

projects.name: Suraksha Mitra : The Crime ManageMent System
projects.desc: The main objective of this system is to maintain and manage detailed information on the crime that happened in an area under a particular police station.

projects.name: eXcelerate: Accelerating Learning through Online Platforms
projects.desc: eXcelerate is a robust software solution that empowers remote education and training. This platform is specifically designed to equip educators with powerful tools for creating and delivering online courses
